SQL_STMT_U.val: select A.DEBH_NO, CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO from :1/DEBH A exception join :1/MQDT on MQDT_MQTY_ID = 125 and MQDT_DEBH_NO = A.DEBH_NO inner join :1/DEBC on DEBC_DEBH = A.DEBH_NO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null inner join :1/ADMN on ADMN_NO = DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS ='N' inner join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBC_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO and CLNT212_INVOICEBUYING = 'N' left outer join :1/DEBH B on B.DEBH_NO = A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH where :2 A.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT is null and A.DEBH_NO > 2 and A.DEBH_DATDELETED is null and (A.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE is null or A.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE <> 1) :3 and (A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = 0 or (A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH <> 0 and (B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT is null or (B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT is not null and B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMITEXPIRY < date(:4))))) group by A.DEBH_NO, CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO order by A.DEBH_NO, CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO

Text.val: Author: Christian Overhoff
09.08.2013 SH SCR18336 Replaced CLNT107_LIMITSANDCONC_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITSANDCONC_CLNTNO
with CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO
07.08.2013 GB SCR18332 Changed value of the PI.HOFF_CODE
06.02.2013 SH SCR17889 Added test ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and CLNT212_INVOICEBUYING = ‘N’
16.12.2011 JH SCR16975 Added test on ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N'
16.04.2011 GB SCR16383 Changed list of parameter if BMQ005 is call
17.01.2011 GB SCR16152 Changed range of link which return the DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
17.04.2008 Fixed problem in DSQL with linebreaks (problems with import)
31.03.2008 SH SCR13497 Added tests on ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and
ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N'
04.03.2008 SH SCR13452 Fixed bug in SQL with selection of DEBH (legal owner)
uses now left outer join instead of inner join
17.11.2007 GB SCR13135 Changed selection of DEBH
30.07.2007 SH SCR12711 Changed test with comparsion of PO.TOTAL and PO.BOTTOM
and added test on DEBH_DATDELETED = null
03.04.2006 AK SCR10901 change V.BOTTOM>0 to V.TOTALS>0
03.04.2006 AK SCR10599 MQ is writen only if V.BOTTOM>0
14.03.2006 CO SCR10599 additional parameter and change in DSQL where clause
13.03.2006 CO SCR10599 fixed problems with range
Additional tests per DEBH have to be done only,
if DEBH is not about to be written to MQ anyway already:
Has this debtor to be written to the MQ?
If not written for this DEBH in former tasks,...:
